page.title: 06Bideford:S+SE.Transport.
page.content: A brief traffic survey on 10.7.1985,on the A386 at Â£Little America',between the times of 2.12.p.m.and 3.12.p.m., showed a traffic density less than half the average recorded on a weekday in the peak month of August 1983 ,(by Torrington D.C.).An analysis of registration numbers revealed the following probable sources of vehicles (assuming that most had driven recently from the places where they were first registered). From Bideford|To Bideford Devon ______________ 9 | _______ 12 Cornwall+S.Eng._____ 44 | _______ 41 Midlands ___________ 19 | _______ 30 N.Eng. _____________ 8 | _______ 14 Scotland ___________ 2 | _______ 3 Wales ______________ 4 | _______ 3 Ireland ____________ 2 | _______ 3 London _____________ 19 | _______ 20 TOTALS____107 | _______126
